details.title: 104: Rosetta
details.actor: Warren Christie/Laura Mennell/Azita Ghanizada/David Strathairn/Ryan Cartwright/Malik Yoba/Erin Way/Mahershala Ali
details.overview: The Alpha team closes in on Red Flag and rescues an autistic woman, Anna, with the ability to translate any language. The team tries to figure out Red Flagâ€™s plan while Gary bonds with Anna.
